main.name: Michael Hsieh
main.description: I currently focus on app development and machine learning. I have also developed websites and data science projects
main.bio: Ever since I was a kid, I've always been fascinated by high tech and building cool things that make a positive impact in people's lives. Following that interest, I've explored all kinds of different tech subfields, including frontend web development, backend, mobile apps, robotics software, data science, and even artificial intelligence. Right now, I make Android and iOS apps. I received a B.S. in Computer Science from the University of California, Santa Cruz, and an M.S. in Software Engineering from San Jose State University, specializing in Data Science.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
